metadata.title: Glossary
metadata.description: The glossary is a list of technical terms with a specific meaning in Consul. Use the glossary to understand Consul concepts and study for the certification exam.

It is started by running `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},"consul agent"),". The agent is able to run in either ",mdx("em",{parentName:"p"},"client"),`
or `,mdx("em",{parentName:"p"},"server"),` mode. Since all nodes must be running an agent, it is simpler to refer to
the node as being either a client or server, but there are other instances of the agent. All
agents can run the DNS or HTTP interfaces, and are responsible for running checks and
keeping services in sync.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"client"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#client","aria-label":"client permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Client"),mdx("p",null,`A client is an agent that forwards all RPCs to a server. The client is relatively
stateless. The only background activity a client performs is taking part in the LAN gossip

`,mdx("a",e({parentName:"p"},{href:"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finite-state_machine"}),"finite-state machine"),`, our definition

other object. It defines what users and groups can access the object and what
operations they can perform.`),mdx("p",null,`Consul uses Access Control Lists (ACLs) to secure the UI, API, CLI, service

built using APIs.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"application-security"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#application-security","aria-label":"application security permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Application Security"),mdx("p",null,`Application Security is the process of making applications secure by detecting

begins.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"application-services"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#application-services","aria-label":"application services permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Application Services"),mdx("p",null,`Application Services are a group of services, such as application performance

`,mdx("a",e({parentName:"p"},{href:"https://docs.aws.amazon.com/autoscaling/ec2/userguide/AutoScalingGroup.html"}),"here"),"."),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"autoscaling"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#autoscaling","aria-label":"autoscaling permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Autoscaling"),mdx("p",null,`Autoscaling is the process of automatically scaling computational resources based
on network traffic requirements.  Autoscaling can be done either horizontally or
vertically. Horizontal scaling is done by adding more machines into the pool of

machine.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"blue-green-deployments"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#blue-green-deployments","aria-label":"blue green deployments permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Blue-Green Deployments"),mdx("p",null,`Blue-Green Deployment is a deployment method designed to reduce downtime by

to a user based on their specific role in the organization.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"server-side-load-balancing"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#server-side-load-balancing","aria-label":"server side load balancing permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Server side load balancing"),mdx("p",null,`A Server-side Load Balancer sits between the client and the server farm,
accepts incoming traffic, and distributes the traffic across multiple backend
servers using various load balancing methods.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-configuration"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-configuration","aria-label":"service configuration permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service configuration"),mdx("p",null,`A service configuration includes the name, description, and the specific
function of a service.  In a microservices application architecture setting,
a service configuration file includes a service definition.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-catalog"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-catalog","aria-label":"service catalog permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service Catalog"),mdx("p",null,`A service catalog is an organized and curated collection of services that
are available for developers to bind to their applications.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-discovery"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-discovery","aria-label":"service discovery permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service Discovery"),mdx("p",null,`Service Discovery is the process of detecting services and devices on a
network.  In a microservices context, service discovery is how applications
and microservices locate each other on a network.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-mesh"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-mesh","aria-label":"service mesh permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service Mesh"),mdx("p",null,`Service Mesh is the infrastructure layer that facilitates service-to-service
communication between microservices, often using a sidecar proxy.  This
network of microservices make up microservice applications and the
interactions between them.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-networking"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-networking","aria-label":"service networking permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service Networking"),mdx("p",null,`Service networking brings several entities together to deliver a particular
service.  Service Networking acts as the brain of an organization's
networking and monitoring operations.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-proxy"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-proxy","aria-label":"service proxy permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service Proxy"),mdx("p",null,`A service proxy is the client-side proxy for a microservice application.
It allows applications to send and receive messages over a proxy server. `),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-registration"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-registration","aria-label":"service registration permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service Registration"),mdx("p",null,`Service registration is the process of letting clients (of the service)
and routers know about the available instances of the service.`,mdx("br",{parentName:"p"}),`
`,"Service instances are registered with a service registry on startup and deregistered at shutdown."),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-registry"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-registry","aria-label":"service registry permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service Registry"),mdx("p",null,`Service Registry is a database of service instances and information on
how to send requests to these service instances.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"microservice-segmentation"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#microservice-segmentation","aria-label":"microservice segmentation permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Microservice Segmentation"),mdx("p",null,`Microservice segmentation, sometimes visual, of microservices is the
segmentation in a microservices application architecture that enables
administrators to view their functions and interactions.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"service-to-service-communication"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#service-to-service-communication","aria-label":"service to service communication permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Service-to-service communication"),mdx("p",null,`Service-to-service communication, sometimes referred to as
inter-service communication, is the ability of a microservice
application instance to communicate with another to collaborate and
handle client requests.`),mdx("h2",e({},{id:"software-as-a-service"}),mdx("a",e({parentName:"h2"},{className:"__permalink-h",href:"#software-as-a-service","aria-label":"software as a service permalink"}),"\xBB"),"Software as a Service"),mdx("p",null,`Software as a Service is a licensing and delivery approach to software
delivery where the software is hosted by a provider and licensed
to users on a subscription basis. `))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.
